data.text: @CityCynthia In the future…like when the election is over 🤨

@CityCynthia So how about you listen to the same guy you've been listening to for the past 2 years?

Oh now that it doesn't coincide with your viewpoint, it's a problem? Get a grip you clown.
@CityCynthia Yeah, his lifting of mask mandates doesn't sound political at all 🤦‍♀️
@CityCynthia That worked well for NB last August 😂
@Ayerlyn4 @CityCynthia So way less that a sports arena.  You’ll be fine…..

@CityCynthia Ok so they said masks are required on public transit..
What about school buses.  No mention of that..they really need to get their ducks in a row before they start announcing changes.  I see both sides..its a choice now but at least be prepared with answers to questions
@CityCynthia Unbelievable, majority is not going to wear 😷they can't wait to get rid of them, so how does this protect rest of us with underlying Medical conditions😥⁉️
@CityCynthia Any predictions on how quickly mask mandates are reintroduced if dofo wins the election? Moore left it open with ‘may be needed in the future…’
